name: plan_email_template
description: Plan the structure, color scheme, and content sections for the email template. Call this first to establish the template design before generating images or writing code.

template_type.description: The type of email template to create

template_name.description: A descriptive name for this email template (e.g., 'Product Launch Email', 'Monthly Newsletter')

text.description: Primary text color (hex code, usually dark for readability)

sections.description: Ordered list of email sections from top to bottom

content_description.description: What content will go in this section

needs_image.description: True if this section needs a generated image (photo/illustration only, not icons)

image_description.description: Description of the image needed (if needs_image is true)

layout_notes.description: Additional notes about layout, spacing, or special design requirements
